participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and motivated, always pushing for personal growth and helping others achieve their goals.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Jake Smith
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a passion for sports and the arts, always looking to explore new interests.
participant_2.background: i played football for a division a college. i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry.

content.text: Really do you like star wars
